page.title: 09A TAXIDERMIST
page.content: Mr.McDonald is a taxidermist.A taxidermist is someone who stuffs animals.He mounts or preserves animals or birds.Mr.McDonald took this hobby up 8 years ago.He married and his wife helps him with his job.He has two children.Originally the taxidermist started in cavemen times but seriously in the 15th Century when Explorers went to America.Their hey-day was in Victorian times.There are 300 taxidermists in England.There are 100 museum taxidermists and 200 commercial taxidermists.Mr.McDonald showed us a stuffed Merlin,Kestrel,Stoat,Weasel, Grey Squirrel.All the stuffed animals are put into natural stands.The animals are stuffed with woodwool. Magnesium is used to puff up the feathers.
